post.text: It's official: Hillary will be the first woman presidential nominee from a major political party. Watch live as she takes the stage in Brooklyn. hrc.io/1RWDBL6

comment.author: Eric
comment.text: Congratulations to a scheming.. cheating.. wall street.. big favor.. big bank.. low life first lady "democratic nominee".. I hope Bernie blocks you at the Convention so Trump doesn't become our next President. Idiot Amerikkka.
